Index.meta_description: Build intelligent applications with Morning AI's comprehensive SaaS platform. Features AI tools, smart design, and powerful integrations for modern businesses.

Hero.title: We Create Intelligent Design & AI Tools
Hero.description: Build powerful applications with our comprehensive SaaS platform. Featuring advanced AI capabilities, intuitive design tools, and seamless integrations for modern businesses.

Features.section_subtitle: Everything you need to build intelligent applications
Features.section_description: Explore our complete suite of features, from intelligent design systems to enterprise-grade solutions.
Features.feature_description: Powerful features to help you build beautiful products faster.

Pricing.section_subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
Pricing.section_description: Start building today with our flexible pricing options designed to grow with your business.

PricingPlan.free_plan_description: Perfect for individuals and small projects
PricingPlan.premium_plan_description: Ideal for growing teams and businesses

CTA.title: Ready to Get Started?
CTA.description: Join thousands of teams already building with Morning AI

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.answer_1: Morning AI is a comprehensive SaaS platform that provides intelligent design tools and AI capabilities for modern businesses.
FAQ.question_2: How does the free trial work?
FAQ.answer_2: You can start with our free plan immediately. No credit card required. Upgrade anytime as your needs grow.
FAQ.answer_3: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
FAQ.question_4: What kind of support do you offer?
FAQ.answer_4: We offer 24/7 email support for all plans, with priority support and phone access for premium plans.
